---

Perfect! I've added a subtle hover effect to the NavBar component. The changes include:

- `hover:opacity-70` - This reduces the opacity to 70% on hover, creating a subtle muting effect
- `transition-opacity duration-200` - This adds a smooth 200ms transition when hovering in and out

The hover effect will make the navigation links appear slightly dimmed when you hover over them, providing nice visual feedback while maintaining the elegant glow effect from the text shadow.
